Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-la
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: tirccayayum ninakk nam dharalam nettam nalkiyirikkunnu
akayal ni ninre raksitavin venti namaskarikkukayum baliyarppikkukayum ceyyuka
tirccayayum ninneat vidvesam vecc pularttunnavan tanneyakunnu valarravan (bhaviyillattavan)
